mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_admin( admin_id, admin_pw, admin_name, admin_email, admin_position, admin_point, session_key, admin_auth_key ) VALUES ( #{adminId}, #{adminPw}, #{adminName}, #{adminEmail}, #{adminPosition}, #{adminPoint}, #{sessionKey}, #{adminAuthKey} )
mapper.select: SELECT admin_position FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
SELECT admin_id FROM tbl_admin WHERE session_key = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id IS NOT NULL AND session_key = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id IS NOT NULL AND admin_email = #{adminEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id IS NOT NULL AND admin_id = #{adminId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT admin_auth_key FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
SELECT * FROM tbl_point ORDER BY point_no ASC
